message.content:
def transform(sequence):
    sequence = sequence.replace("00077", "00088")
    sequence = sequence.replace("0077", "0066")
    sequence = sequence.replace("770", "660")
    sequence = sequence.replace("707", "606")
    sequence = sequence.replace("7", "8")
    sequence = sequence.replace("0", "6")
    return sequence
